embeds.title: Bug (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Bug
Original character designed for Seven Deadly Sins: Origin. A Darkness-element DPS with three distinct playstyles: raw burst with Axe, back-attack assassin with Dual Swords, and stealth/decoy utility with Book.
